page.title: 18The Future School (ideas?)
page.content: Where held? At home.As we are now. Go to different places for each subject. Skyscraper with your own office- paid for how much work you do. Mobile, circulating classrooms. What Lessons? English and other languages. Maths. Reading. Science. History. Jet Pack Flying. Shuttle Handling. Computer Studies. Geography & Earth Studies. PE in a community Sports Centre - mostly indoor. What Machines will be used? Delivery shute. Light pen & screen. Computer, video disks, TV, tapes, word processors. Telephone. How get to school? C5. Subway with vacuum powered electric trains. Remote controlled coach. Electric bike or car. Roller boots. Jet packs. Walkways
